name: Suzuran
pros: Attacks deal Arts damage and briefly slows enemies
Childhood Frolic allows Suzuran to attack two enemies at once
Skill Aura - Supporter increases the SP generation rate of Supporters
Foxfire Haze continuously slows enemies and heals allies within an expanded range, and makes Binding Circle more effective
Binding Circle applies the Fragile debuff to slowed enemies within Suzuran's range
cons: Skill Aura - Supporter does not stack with Ptilopsis' Skill Aura and only affect Operators with automatic SP recovery
Foxfire Haze stops Suzuran from attacking
Must be leveled and promoted to Elite 2 for maximum effectiveness
